Question
========
  
Research with children who are victims of domestic violence shows that trauma therapy ($X_{1}$) reduces trauma symptoms (*Y*). The relationship between therapy and trauma symptoms is stronger when parents have also been in therapy ($X_{2}$).

What multivariate relationship is this? 
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple causes
* Moderation
* Full mediation
* Partial mediation

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
